sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Flex, Button, Text, Stack } from '@chakra-ui/core';
import {
  Modal,
  ModalOverlay,
  ModalContent,
  ModalHeader,
  ModalFooter,
  ModalBody,
  ModalCloseButton,
  useDisclosure,
  SlideIn,
} from '@chakra-ui/core';
export default function Start(props: any) {
  const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure();

  return (
    <Flex width={['100%']} height={['100vh']} align="center" justify="center">
      <Flex align="center" justify="center">
        <Stack spacing={5}>
          <Text color="gray.500">Try to beat the high score!</Text>
          <Button
            onClick={() => props.setView('play')}
            variantColor="teal"
            variant="outline"
          >
            Start
          </Button>
          <Button
            onClick={() => onOpen()}
            variantColor="tomato"
            variant="outline"
          >
            Start
          </Button>
        </Stack>
      </Flex>
      <SlideIn in={isOpen}>
        {(styles) => (
          <Modal onClose={onClose} isOpen={true}>
            <ModalOverlay opacity={styles.opacity} />
            <ModalContent pb={5} {...styles}>
              <ModalHeader>Login now</ModalHeader>
              <ModalCloseButton />
              <ModalBody>Highscore</ModalBody>
            </ModalContent>
          </Modal>
        )}
      </SlideIn>
    </Flex>
  );
}
